description: Commands to manage resources commonly used for student hacks.

commands.name: az hack create
commands.summary: Create resources commonly used for a student hack, including a website, database, and artificial intelligence.
commands.syntax:
az hack create --location
               --name
               --runtime {aspnet, jetty, node, php, python, tomcat}
               [--ai]
               [--database {cosmosdb, mysql, sql}]
examples: az hack create --name samplename --runtime python --location westus2 --database mysql
az hack create --name samplename --runtime node --location westus2 --database sql --ai

commands.name: az hack show
commands.summary: Display settings for created resources, including database name and password, Git url, and website url.
